Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ra.raadmin

Interface AdminPreferenceSessionLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AdminPreferenceSession
    public interface AdminPreferenceSessionLocal
extends AdminPreferenceSession
    Local interface for RaAdminSession.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ejbca.core.ejb.ra.raadmin.AdminPreferenceSession

        addAdminPreference, changeAdminPreference, changeAdminPreferenceNoLog, existsAdminPreference, getAdminPreference, getDefaultAdminPreference, saveDefaultAdminPreference

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableRaStyleInfos

        List<RaStyleInfo> getAvailableRaStyleInfos​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Returns custom RA Styles associated with the role of the requesting administrator. If the administrator has requested styles very recently, the same content will be returned to prevent requests via Peers for for every resource request e.g. in a page load in the RA web.
        Parameters:
        admin - authenticationToken of the requesting administrator
        Returns:
        List of custom RA styles available for the requesting administrator

      • getCurrentRaStyleId

        Integer getCurrentRaStyleId​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Returns the currently set RA style id for the requested administrator.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken the administrators holding the preferences.
        Returns:
        RA style id currently set in the RA GUI for the administrator @admin. Null if @admin has no preferences set.

      • setCurrentRaStyleId

        void setCurrentRaStyleId​(int currentStyleId,
                         AuthenticationToken admin)
        Sets the current RA Style id the requesting administrator.
        Parameters:
        currentStyleId - current style id for the admin.
        admin - is the admin who is saving its preferences in database.

      • getCurrentRaLocale

        Locale getCurrentRaLocale​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Returns the currently set locale for the requesting administrator.
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator saving its data to the database.
        Returns:
        Currently set Locale in the RA GUI for the administrator @admin.

      • setCurrentRaLocale

        void setCurrentRaLocale​(Locale locale,
                        AuthenticationToken admin)
        Sets the current locale for the requesting administrator.
        Parameters:
        locale - current locale for this admin.
        admin - is the admin who is saving its preferences in database.

      • getPreferedRaStyleInfo

        RaStyleInfo getPreferedRaStyleInfo​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Returns the RaStyleInfo which will be used by the requesting administrator. If there are multiple styles available and no preferences has been set by the administrator, the first one available will be returned.
        Parameters:
        admin - Authentication token of the requesting administrator
        Returns:
        Preferred RaStyleInfo for the requested administrator. Null if 'Default' (Id 0) is selected or if no styles are available

      • getAdminPreferences

        Map<String,​AdminPreference> getAdminPreferences()
        Returns:
        map containing all admin preferences defined in the current ejbca instance and their human readable name as String.
